column4: any idea why unetbootin wouldnt be showing my USB flash drive in the options?
it is, i see it on my desktop
are you hitting the usb dropdown
did you mount it after opening unetbotin?
try opening it again after unmoutning the usb then remounting.
will it only read FAT32 formatted?
I think so what do you have?
yeah what is the OS you want in it?
easy put a boot flag on it and extract W7 to it with the file roller
I have the win7 iso file
exatly click on the iso and extract to the thumb put a boot flag on that partition with gparted and it will boot.
thumb is a name for a pendrive
i've but the iso files into my NTFS formatted usb drive, now how do i set the boot flag with GParted?
